invention-title: Method for preparing high-purity petroleum coke by coupling microwave-H2 enhanced alkali roasting with ultrasonic acid leaching
一种微波-H2强化碱焙烧耦合超声酸浸制备高纯石油焦的方法

abstract.p: The invention relates to a method for preparing high-purity petroleum coke by coupling microwave-H2 enhanced alkali roasting with ultrasonic acid leaching, and belongs to the technical field of petroleum coke purification. For delayed coke with the sulfur content of 3-15 wt.%, the silicon dioxide content of 0.5-1.5 wt.%, a small amount of metal impurities such as vanadium and nickel and the fixed carbon content of 80% or above, petroleum coke particles and an alkaline additive are evenly mixed to obtain a mixed material; the mixed material is placed in a microwave roasting furnace, hydrogen-argon mixed gas is introduced at a constant speed, microwave roasting is conducted for 60-90 min at the temperature of 600-1200 DEG C, and a roasted product is obtained; adding the roasted product into deionized water, and performing water immersion treatment under a stirring condition to obtain an intermediate petroleum coke product; and adding the intermediate petroleum coke product into an acid solution for ultrasonic enhanced leaching, and then adding into deionized water for water leaching treatment to obtain a high-purity petroleum coke product. According to the method, the delayed coke can be purified to obtain the high-purity petroleum coke of which the sulfur content is as low as 0.1%, the silicon dioxide content is lower than 0.1%, the volatile component content is lower than 0.1% and the fixed carbon content is more than 99.9%.

本发明涉及一种微波‑H2强化碱焙烧耦合超声酸浸制备高纯石油焦的方法，属于石油焦提纯技术领域。针对硫含量为3～15wt.％、二氧化硅含量为0.5～1.5wt.％并有少量钒、镍等金属杂质、固定碳含量为80％以上的延迟焦，本发明将石油焦颗粒和碱性添加剂混合均匀得到混合物料；将混合物料置于微波焙烧炉内，匀速通入氢气‑氩气混合气体，在温度600～1200℃下微波焙烧60～90min得到焙烧产物；将焙烧产物加入到去离子水中，在搅拌条件下水浸处理得到中间石油焦产品；将中间石油焦产品加入酸溶液中超声强化浸出，然后加入到去离子水中水浸处理得到高纯石油焦产品。本发明可提纯延迟焦得到硫含量低0.1％、二氧化硅含量低于0.1％、挥发分含量低于0.1％、固定碳含量99.9％以上的高纯石油焦。
